amendatorysection.catchline: Criminal homicide cases; review and analysis by Supreme Court; manner.
amendatorysection.para: The Supreme Court shall within a reasonable time after July 22, 1978, review and analyze all cases involving criminal homicide committed on or after April 20, 1973. Such review and analysis shall examine (1) the facts including mitigating and aggravating circumstances, (2) the charges filed, (3) the crime for which defendant was convicted, and (4) the sentence imposed. Such review shall be updated as new criminal homicide cases occur.

source.note: The repeal of section 29-2521.02 by Laws 2015, LB 268, section 35, is not effective because of the vote on the referendum at the November 2016 general election. This version of section 29-2521.02 is found in Volume 1 of the 2014 Cumulative Supplement of the Revised Statutes of Nebraska.
